intro_function: We help you record books for your loved ones, however they may be behaving currently. This version used DropBox to store images and recordings. Specifically, it uses your DropBox account, making a folder called \Apps\PlayItAgainKid. It"s your own disk in the cloud, easy to copy anywhere. This means you always will have your originals, and that we never even see anything you create.
intro_signin: If you are not a current user, you may want to sign up on their site first. Or, install their app.
intro_disclaimer: This website or app is not affiliated with or otherwise sponsored by Dropbox, Inc.
first_book_intro:
The menu at the left has an entry, 'Make a new book.',

You can open the menu, if it is closed, by hitting the icon

To take a picture, when you can see the camera active on the screen, you can take a picture by hitting anywhere on the screen. You can always replace it if you want a second chance.
